Author: princess-kitty-belle
Text: Yes I totally do this too! I have to give my food my full attention. I feel like it's because I'm trying to get the most out of the food as I'm eating it.

Author: laisserai
Text: I'm known among my friends that if we are eating together I tell them to 'tell me a story'. I cannot eat in silence or else I will go crazy. I need to be watching/listenting/reading something!
